ComicInfo.Summary:
All guns and ammo are pointed at Brigade as Bloodstrike fights to destroy Battlestone's trans-dimensional network!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Rob Liefeld | 1 | | B | Cover B | Rob Liefeld | 2 |
Notes: Shaft and Fourplay appear only on the cover. Despite being mentioned in the blurb, Battlestone and Brigade do not appear in this issue. Although former members of the Bloodstrike team (Cabbot, Deadlock and Shogun) appear in this issue, they do not operate as a team.
